name: Impaler of Thorns
body:
Hands 2; Usage Held in 2 hands; Bulk 2
This +1 Striking Longspear has a shaft made of darkwood and its head is a thorn-like, wide-bladed barb.
Activate (aa) Intimidating Strike; When activated, you make an intimidating strike as the fighter feat. If you have the Intimidating Strike feat, increase the frightened condition value from this Intimidating Strike to frightened 2, or frightened 3 on a critical hit.
Activate (r) (envision); Trigger Your attack roll with the Impaler of Thorns is a critical success; the struck creature and all creatures within 30-feet of the struck creature except for creatures wielding an Impaler of Thorns must make a DC23 will save to avoid being overcome by despair. A creature who succeeds is unaffected; on a failure the creature is slowed 1 for 1 round and unable to take reactions while slowed; on a critical failure the creature is slowed 1 for 1 minute and unable to take reactions while slowed.
